title: Nation Building Dapps
description: What core Dapp solutions can be provided for widespread governments adoption in the developing world?

f6_assessments.q0: A challenge about Dapps for poor nations, aiming at economic development and financial inclusion: it definitely serves Cardano's mission !
f6_assessments.q1: The underlying concepts of the problem a clearly stated by the introduction video. As it is impactful and it will engage the community. Many proposal will certainly be made for this challenge.
f6_assessments.q2: Many metrics to measure are listed to measure the success of this challenge. No minimum threshold is set but it is not necessary for a new challenge.

importance: For the poor nations with no foundations to stand on, Government Dapp solutions will be the building blocks enabling sustainable prosperity
success: Dapps adoption by Governments across developing nations, in collaboration with Local Community Centers and International Partnerships
